content: cuddles was crocheted with size h hook and worsted weight yarn and stands approximately 6 high i used 81 yards of the main color and 3 5 yards of the contrasting color i used red heart super saver but any worsted weight yarn medium 4 on the label would work this is an easy pattern that uses the following stitches chain slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet explained in the pattern double_crochet single_crochet 2 together double_crochet 2 together explained in the pattern the pattern totals 5 pages of detailed instructions which include photos of the different steps where needed all instructional photos are placed at the end of the file so you may choose not to print them if desired this pattern is in pdf format so you will need adobe reader to open the document and print it you can download adobe reader for free at www adobe com
